description: Season of Sharing provides emergency housing assistance and/or critical needs for those with a non-recurring crisis. Those who may be considered for assistance are: families with children under age 18 living in the home, individuals over the age of 60, and permanently disabled individuals in crisis who are currently residing in Alameda County for at least 6 continuous months. To initiate an inquiry, contact the automated pre-screening line at (510) 272-3700.

name: SSA Season Of Sharing Program
